revision.comment: add missing final period (full stop) in 'From ...' line
revision.text: ==Translingual== ===Etymology=== From Latin {{m|la|xanthos||yello}} + {{m|la|ger≈ç||I bear}}. ===Adjective=== {{head|mul|adjective|g=m|feminine|xanthigera|neuter|xanthigerum}} # colored [[yellow]] ====Derived terms==== * {{taxlink|Andrena xanthigera|species|noshow=1}}
